data.title: Top 18 Countries with World’s Most Beautiful Women– EaseMyTrip.com
data.meta_description: Women from these countries are famous for being really beautiful and gorgeous. Explore places with most beautiful women in the world at EaseMyTrip.com
data.text:
There is several heart touching quotes stating beauty lies in the eyes of beholders, beauty is a virtue that lies within a person and it also lies in the way we look at beauty. Despite all these beautiful quotes, one can't resist the fact that visual beauty appeals every one. Wherever people see the physical beauty, they get attracted towards it. While talking about beauty, you can't miss to discuss about the by default beautiful creature of god – women. They are naturally beautiful but there are some countries that are considered to have the most gorgeous women on this planet. This article is going to tell you about the countries with the most gorgeous women. Explore the list of such 10 countries in the world with most beautiful ladies.

Turkey

Meryem Uzerli, Actress

Turkey always grabs first position whenever you talk about the most beautiful women in the world. Enjoying strong association with various historical cultures and ancient empires, the country has produced some really photogenic ladies with immaculate natural beauty. Women in Turkey are also known for carrying themselves with utter grace and grandeur. Watch the Turkish soaps and operas if you have any doubt about it.

Brazil

Alinne Moraes, Actress

Brazil is a country that is known for its unique geographical features, scenic nature; rich historical grace and beautiful culture. And Brazilian women are famous for their awareness about socialization and traditions. They beautifully know how to carry themselves and playing key role in any event held in their country. So, Brazil also turns to be a country holding the most stunning women of the world.

France

Louise Bourgoin, TV Actor Model

Located in Western Europe, France is home to the stunning medieval cities, scenic alpine villages and gorgeous Mediterranean beaches. Also renowned for its versatile culture, sophisticated cuisines & wines and vibrant fashion sense, the country is home of really beautiful women. French women are recognized for their gregarious outlook, liveliness, amiable vibes and unparalleled fashion statement. These gorgeous females are not only sophisticated but also encompass incredible personalities.

Russia

Maria Sharapova, Tennis Player

The world's largest nation, Russia is an enchanting place known for its stunning landscape ranging from tundra forests to subtropical beaches. Just like the country, Russian beauty and women are also famous for their beauty in entire world and one can’t resist their splendor. From its tennis players to gymnasts and from models to actors, amazingly gorgeous Russian women leave everyone speechless and charm people with their fascinating blue eyes and flawless features.

Italy

Monica Bellucci, Model

Known for its beautiful culture, relishing food and enriching tourism opportunities, Italy has its own Mediterranean charm. Italian girls are also known for the same Mediterranean charisma. It is really difficult to not become excited about a gorgeous Italian lady. While living in one of the major fashion hubs of the world, Italian women have great fashion sense and it makes them really attractive. This is the reason; they are supposed to be the most beautiful women in the world.

India

Priyanka Chopra, Actor & Model

India, being land of diversities, has several unique features and beautiful attractions. The dusky complexioned stunning Indian women are famous in the world for their mysteriously gorgeous aura. Their long dark hair and beautiful eyes make them simply breathtaking. Oriental Indian beauties wearing sari with smile are capable of steeling your heart. They are considered among the most beautiful women in the world.

Ukraine

Yulia Tymoshenko, Politician (Former Prime Minister of Ukrain)

This huge country of Eastern Europe is known for its Orthodox churches, Black Sea coastline and lush green mountains dotted with trees. The country is also known for being home to some of the boldest and prettiest women in the world. Ukrainian ladies are perfect combination of sensuousness and cuteness.

Venezuela

Mariana Jimenez, Model & Beauty Pageant

Located in the northern coast of South America, Venezuela is gifted numerous wonderful tourist attractions. The land is also blessed with really gorgeous ladies who have brought maximum number of crowns from several international beauty contests in their country. It has many Miss Universe and Miss World winners. Women from Venezuela are perfectly figured and have attractive features. Venezuela is one of the countries with the most beautiful women in the world.

United Kingdom

Georgie Twigg, Hockey Player

Being the birthplace of Shakespeare and enjoying blend of beautiful cultures, United Kingdom has everything that you expect from a country. British women are also mix of varied cultures that make them of different skin tones and appearance. These British ladies are sophisticated, educated, and gorgeous, including their politicians, players and actors.

Canada/USA

Eugenie Bouchard, Tennis Player

Everything about America is simply amazing so is American women. They are joyful, independent and carry themselves with an incredible grace. On the streets of different American cities, you can encounter many beautiful women completely aware of the social advancements and technological developments. Their knowledge beautifully combines with their alluring personalities and makes them one of the most beautiful in the world.

Sweden

Zara Larsson, Singer

The stunning Scandinavian nation of Sweden is known for surreal forests, coastal islands, glittering lakes and glacial mountains. It is also known for being home to the most beautiful women in the world. With complete elegance, sporty charm and passionately deep eyes, women of Sweden are perfect beauties. Swedish women are famous for their whitish complexion, perfectly shaped lips, gorgeous tall figure and intense eyes of blue or green color. One more thing that makes women of Sweden most beautiful in the world is being them perfect blend of intelligence and beauty. With high level of academic opportunities in the country, there is very lesser chance of coming across any stupid lady in Sweden.

Afghanistan

Seeta Qasemi, Afghan Singer/Song Writer

Under the brutal and frustrating history of Afghanistan, women of this country have witnessed much suppression and violence. Still, they emerge to be the most gorgeous women in the world. There are many beautiful Afghan women who became successful actress, models and winner of beauty pageants by going out of their country as creativity is cruelly punished in this country. Many beautiful girls of Afghan origin are supposed to be the most stunning in the world.

Colombia

Shakira, Song Writer & Dancer

In the origin of Colombia, there is a mix of various nations and bloodline. You can find here world’s most beautiful girls having white skin with blue eyes or bronze skin gorgeous women with eyes of coffee shade. Women of Colombia are considered one of most beautiful in the world. They are not just cute but their extraordinary appeal has the added benefit of great dressing and fashion sense. They can do everything to possess a stunning appearance. This is the reason; Colombia has highest number of surgical feature corrections. Owing to its gorgeous ladies, it is also called as the ‘Hotness Capital of the World’.

Argentina

Araceli Edith González, Fashion Model

Having the magic of Latin race and to be very well-dressed, Argentinean women are among the most beautiful women of the world. They are original descendants of Europe and known for their gorgeous figure. They are completely dedicated for their appearances and known for their angelic personalities. With Mediterranean genes and healthy diet, they are in shape for a longtime. Their lifestyle and lingual skills make them so attractive.

Bulgaria

Romina Andonova, Model

You might not have heard a lot about Bulgaria but it too is country with lots of gorgeous attractions, stunning beaches and ski-resorts. One of the most striking features of Bulgaria is their gorgeous women. Often having tall persona with pale skin, usually dark hair and bright blue or green eyes, Bulgarian women are simply mesmerizing. They are also in list of most beautiful women in the world.

Pakistan

Ayla Malik, Politician

Mostly renowned for the political controversies and not so good reasons, Pakistan is also home to some great tourist attractions. However, the most important thing that makes it stand apart from others is the gorgeous Pakistani women. Women of Pakistan are really beautiful. Usually having ivory complexion, long dark hair and mysterious personality, Pakistani women are well-known for their breathtaking aura. They are considered among the most beautiful women in the world.

Philippines

Bea Alonzo, Actress and Model

With having gorgeous features and charming face-cuts, women from Philippines are one of the beautiful among all. They have a personality that can make every man be attracted towards them. They are charming, fun-loving and attractive. They are also in the list top countries winning beauty pageants.

Denmark

Beate Bille, Actress

Women of Denmark possess a mysterious aura that can be compared with little mermaids. Being modern, courageous, educated and independent, Danish women are simply awesome. Their appearances are complemented with magnetic personality, good proliferation, liberty and openness of nature. All these features make Danish women one of the most gorgeous ones in the world.
